EN.title: General Industries
EN.subtitle: Metal & Steel
EN.content: Our pumping and mixing solutions for the metal industry are designed for corrosive and abrasive liquids. We offer special expertise for the production of alumina, aluminum, copper, nickel, and zinc.

TH.title: อุตสาหกรรมทั่วไป
TH.subtitle: อุตสาหกรรมอะโลหะและเหล็ก
TH.content: Our pumping and mixing solutions for the metal industry are designed for corrosive and abrasive liquids. We offer special expertise for the production of alumina, aluminum, copper, nickel, and zinc.
